message.body: Hey, I was just thinking about you. Michelle told me you were down in Florida and I was wondering how you were holding up.

Thanks for your text, ##### It's been a tough week. My mom's in hospice care now and is slowly slipping over to the other side. Not sure how long she's got. Maybe days, maybe weeks. The up side is that I get to spend time with my dad, brothers and nieces. Not sure when I'll be back in Philly, but I'll surely be due for a beer or two. Say hi to D for me. xxS
You are great for seeing the positive in your situation. I say hi to D for you when I see him next and I'm looking forward to those ######with you when you get back.
